de.lambeck.pned.models.gui

Class GuiModelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.models.gui.GuiModelController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfo_DrawingAreaSize, IInfo_MousePos, IInfo_SelectionRangeSize, IInfo_Status, IGuiModelController

    public class GuiModelController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGuiModelController
    Observes the state of the GUI.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

      • sourceNodeForNewArc

        private IGuiNode sourceNodeForNewArc
        The source node for the new Arc to be added.

        Note: The local attribute "addingNewArc" should be true if this attribute is != null.

      • sourceForNewArcType

        private ENodeType sourceForNewArcType
        The type of the source node for the new Arc to be added.

      • drawArcMode

        private boolean drawArcMode
        Stores whether this GUI model controller is in "draw new arc" mode or not. This always refers to the current GUI model.

        If true: The mouse adapter has to report new mouse positions in order to update/repaint the (temporary) overlay with the new arc while the user is moving the mouse towards the 2nd node.

      • addGuiModel

        public void addGuiModel(java.lang.String modelName,
                        java.lang.String displayName)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Adds a GUI model for a non-existing file.

        Note: This is intended to be used to add new models which are not coming from a PNML file (e.g. "Untitled1", "Untitled2"... or "New1", "New2"...)
        Specified by:
        addGuiModel in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The full path name of the PNML file
        displayName - The title of the tab (= the file name)

        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Resets the "modified" state of the specified model.

        Note: Use this method after loading a PNML file because the model has not been changed by the user after adding elements from the PNML file only.
        Specified by:
        resetModifiedGuiModel in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:

      • updateKeyInModelNameDependentMaps

        private void updateKeyInModelNameDependentMaps(java.lang.String oldKey,
                                               java.lang.String newKey)
        Replaces the old key with the new key in every Map that depends on the name of an IGuiModel.

        This is realized by removing the entry associated with that old key and re-inserting that entry with the new key.
        Parameters:
        oldKey - the specified old key representing the name of the model
        newKey - the specified new key representing the name of the model

      • isDuplicateKeyInModelNameDependentMaps

        private boolean isDuplicateKeyInModelNameDependentMaps(java.lang.String newKey)
        Checks whether the specified key already exists in a Map that depends on the name of an IDataModel.
        Parameters:
        newKey - the specified key representing the name of a model
        Returns:
        true = newKey is a duplicate in at least 1 Map; false = newKey is no duplicate in any of the Maps

        private IGuiElement getSingleElementForZValueAction()
                                             throws PNNoSuchElementException
        Returns the single IGuiElement for a ZValue Action (e.g. "moveToForeground").

        This is:
        1. If a popup menu is active: the element at the popup menu location
        2. If a single element is selected: this selected element
        3. Otherwise: null
        Returns:
        A IGuiElement
        Throws:
        PNNoSuchElementException - if the element was not found or is ambiguous

                                        java.lang.String nodeId,
                                        boolean b)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Handles the ApplicationController request to update the status of the specified GUI node.
        Specified by:
        highlightUnreachableGuiNode in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        nodeId - The id of the IGuiNode
        b - True = unreachable; False = can be reached from the start place and can reach the end place

      • getGuiModelForDataValidationOnly

        private IGuiModel getGuiModelForDataValidationOnly(java.lang.String modelName)
        Returns the specified IGuiModel with suppressed error messages if not found because this error can be expected in rare cases.

        Explanation: This method is part of the validation process. And the validation controller thread might slightly lagging behind in terms of the current model (e.g. if the user has suddenly closed the current file during validation).
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        The specified IGuiModel if found; otherwise null

      • fireGuiTransition

        public void fireGuiTransition()
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Callback to fire the transition at the popup menu location.

        Note: The purpose of this method in IGuiModelController is mainly to provide the ID of the desired IDataTransition to the IDataModelController because the popup menu location is known only to the GUI controller.
        Specified by:
        fireGuiTransition in interface IGuiModelController

      • canUndo

        public boolean canUndo()
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Indicates whether an Undo operation for the current IGuiModel is legal. (Undo stack is not empty.)

        Note: This is intended to be used to enable the EditUndoAction.
        Specified by:
        canUndo in interface IGuiModelController
        Returns:
        true = at least 1 edit can be undone; false = no edit can be undone

      • getCurrentModelUndoStack

        private IGuiModelStack getCurrentModelUndoStack()
        Returns the Undo stack (IGuiModelStack) for the current IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        the Undo stack as IGuiModelStack; or null if current model is null or the stack does not exist.

      • canRedo

        public boolean canRedo()
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Indicates whether a Redo operation for the current IGuiModel is legal. (Redo stack is not empty.)

        Note: This is intended to be used to enable the EditRedoAction.
        Specified by:
        canRedo in interface IGuiModelController
        Returns:
        true = at least 1 edit can be redone; false = no edit can be redone

      • getCurrentModelRedoStack

        private IGuiModelStack getCurrentModelRedoStack()
        Returns the Redo stack (IGuiModelStack) for the current IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        the Redo stack as IGuiModelStack; or null if current model is null or the stack does not exist.

      • makeUndoable

        private int makeUndoable()
        Puts a copy of the current IGuiModel onto the Undo stack (IGuiModelStack).

        Note: This method is private because this IGuiModelController should start all Undo operations.
        Returns:
        0 = Success: model made undoable
        1 = Error: currentModel == null
        2 = Error: copy == null
        3 = Error: undoStack == null

      • cloneCurrentModel

        private IGuiModel cloneCurrentModel()
        Clones the current IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        a copy of the current IGuiModel; or null if errors occurred.

      • makeRedoable

        private int makeRedoable()
        Puts a copy of the current IGuiModel onto the Redo stack (IGuiModelStack).

        Note: This method is private because this IGuiModelController should start all Redo operations.
        Returns:
        0 = Success: model made redoable
        1 = Error: currentModel == null
        2 = Error: copy == null
        3 = Error: redoStack == null

      • Undo

        public void Undo()
          throws javax.swing.undo.CannotUndoException
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Undoes the last edit in the current IGuiModel and invokes Undo on the IDataModelController.
        Specified by:
        Undo in interface IGuiModelController
        Throws:
        javax.swing.undo.CannotUndoException - if there are no edits to be undone

      • getUndoModel

        private IGuiModel getUndoModel()
                        throws javax.swing.undo.CannotUndoException
        Returns the last copy of the current IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        An IGuiModel from the Undo stack
        Throws:
        javax.swing.undo.CannotUndoException - if currentModel or undoStack == null or undoStack.empty()

      • Redo

        public void Redo()
          throws javax.swing.undo.CannotRedoException
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Redoes the following edit in the current IGuiModel and invokes Redo on the IDataModelController.
        Specified by:
        Redo in interface IGuiModelController
        Throws:
        javax.swing.undo.CannotRedoException - if there are no edits to be redone

      • getRedoModel

        private IGuiModel getRedoModel()
                        throws javax.swing.undo.CannotRedoException
        Returns the next copy of the current IGuiModel.
        Returns:
        An IGuiModel from the Redo stack
        Throws:
        javax.swing.undo.CannotRedoException - if currentModel or redoStack == null or redoStack.empty()
